gist.headline: Nailed It!
gist.blurb: Time for a digital manicure? The hive just got a lot more stylish with this new nail art generator.
gist.summary: Added 'nails-generator' to the Creative showcase, allowing users to generate AI nail art designs.
gist.impact: Users can now explore and generate custom manicure styles, colors, and patterns directly through the platform.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy salon scene where Polly the bee is applying artistic patterns to a robot's claws. Represents the new nail art generation tool.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a tiny brush, painting colorful pixel patterns on a robot's metal claws. A vanity mirror glows with lime green (#ecf874) light. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, wholesome vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NAILED IT'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
